description:
This market refers to the tennis match between Giovanni Mpetshi Perricard and Arthur Gea in the Open Sud de France, scheduled for February 2 2026.
This market will resolve to "Perricard" if Giovanni Mpetshi Perricard wins by 2 or more sets than Arthur Gea, based on the final completed score. Otherwise, it will resolve to "Gea."
If the match begins but is not completed, this market will resolve 50-50. If the match is canceled before play begins or delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a result, this market will also resolve 50-50.
Resolution will be based on official ATP results.

events.description:
This market refers on the tennis match between Arthur Gea and Giovanni Mpetshi Perricard in the Open Sud de France, scheduled for February 2 at 4:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to 'Gea' if Arthur Gea advances against Giovanni Mpetshi Perricard.

This market will resolve to 'Perricard' if Giovanni Mpetshi Perricard advances against Arthur Gea.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50.

If the match begins but is not completed, and one player advances due to the opponent's retirement, default, or disqualification, this market will resolve to the player who advances.

If the match ends in a walkover (player withdraws before the start and the other advances automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50.

The primary resolution source will be official information from the ATP Tour. A consensus of credible reporting may also be used.
events.title: Open Sud de France: Arthur Gea vs Giovanni Mpetshi Perricard

groupItemTitle: Open Sud de France: Arthur Gea vs Giovanni Mpetshi Perricard Set Handicap +/-1.5
question: Set Handicap: Perricard (-1.5) vs Gea (+1.5)
